arts.ttl: Vitinha backs PSG to beat Liverpool at Anfield while Achraf Hakimi insists the French side 'deserved to win' following controversial 1-0 smash-and-grab result for the Reds
arts.sum: The PSG players believe they deserved to beat Liverpool in the first leg of their Champions League Round of 16 clash and are determined to overturn their 1-0 deficit at Anfield next week.

arts.ttl: Liverpool’s Alisson Becker Reacts to Brilliant Nine-Save Performance Against PSG
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain generated many scoring chances in their 1-0 first leg loss to Liverpool on Wednesday night at Parc des Princes. However, the star of the match and the player that kept the capital club off the score sheet was Alisson Becker. arts.ttl: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia Delivers Blunt Analysis on PSG’s First-Leg Defeat to Liverpool
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain had plenty of chances but couldn’t convert in a 1-0 loss to Liverpool on Wednesday night at the Parc des Princes in the first leg of their UEFA Champions League Round of 16 clash. The Parisians dominated much of the first half, outshooting Liverpool 12-1, but couldn’t break through. arts.ttl: Alisson put on a show fit for a king as football royalty watched Liverpool snatch a late win over PSG... the Brazilian's heroics will go down in Reds folklore, writes LEWIS STEELE
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT THE PARC DES PRINCES: With football royalty David Beckham watching on in the stands, Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson put on a show that was fit for a king.

arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate denies claims he should have been sent off for shoving Bradley Barcola during Liverpool's smash-and-grab win over PSG
arts.sum: Ibrahima Konate has rejected claims that he should have been sent off for his challenge on Bradley Barcola during Liverpool 's 1-0 win over Paris Saint-Germain.

arts.ttl: 'I see the same': Arne Slot shares what he really thought about Trent Alexander-Arnold's defending vs PSG
PSG star makes Anfield promise after Liverpool snatch first leg win - 'We're going to win there'
arts.sum: PSG dominated Liverpool in Wednesday's first leg of their Champions League last 16, but the Reds have a slender advantage after claiming a remarkable smash-and-grab win

arts.ttl: 'I can't believe': Jamie Carragher makes brutally honest Liverpool admission after last night's win at PSG
arts.sum: Liverpool will be returning to Merseyside with the advantage at the halfway point of their Champions League last-16 tie against Paris Saint-Germain. Arne Slot’s Reds...
